name: Professional Shampoo

image.alt: Professional Shampoo Bottle on Salon & Barber Shelf
image.caption: Gentle daily cleansing for all hair types.

summary: A professional-grade cleansing shampoo designed for consistent results in salon & barber routines.
benefits: Balanced cleansing suitable for daily salon & barber use
Prepares hair for treatment and styling
howToUse:
Apply to wet hair. Massage into scalp and lengths, then rinse thoroughly. Repeat if necessary.
For best results, follow with the recommended conditioner or treatment.

name: Barber Styling Pomade

image.caption: Strong hold with a classic matte finish.

summary: A professional pomade for barbers seeking controlled hold and clean finish.
howToUse: Warm a small amount between palms. Apply evenly to dry or slightly damp hair. Style as desired.

name: Treatment Mask
summary: A professional treatment mask for hydration and improved manageability.
benefits: Designed for salon & barber service routines
howToUse: After shampooing, apply to towel-dried hair. Leave for 5–10 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

name: Keratin Smoothing Treatment
summary: Professional keratin treatment for long-lasting smoothness and frizz control.
benefits: Reduces frizz for up to 12 weeks
howToUse: Apply to clean, towel-dried hair. Process under heat for 30-45 minutes. Rinse and style.

name: Color Protection Serum
summary: Lightweight serum that extends color vibrancy and protects against fade.
howToUse: Apply 2-3 drops to damp or dry hair. Focus on mid-lengths and ends. Style as usual.

name: Matte Clay Wax

image.caption: High hold with a natural matte look.

summary: High-hold matte clay for textured, modern styles for barbers.
howToUse: Rub between palms until warm. Work through dry hair for textured, defined styles.

name: Scalp Revitalizing Tonic
summary: Professional scalp treatment that promotes healthy scalp environment.
howToUse: Apply directly to scalp after washing. Massage gently. Do not rinse.

name: Volumizing Mousse

image.caption: Weightless volume for fine to normal hair.

summary: Lightweight mousse for lasting volume and body without stiffness.
howToUse: Shake well. Apply to damp hair at roots. Blow dry for maximum volume.

name: Argan Repair Oil

image.caption: Instant shine and frizz control with Argan Oil.

summary: Lightweight argan-based oil for instant shine and frizz control.
howToUse: Apply 1-2 drops to damp or dry hair. Focus on mid-lengths and ends. Can be used as a finishing touch.

name: Beard Grooming Oil
summary: Premium beard oil for softening and conditioning facial hair.
howToUse: Apply 3-5 drops to palms. Massage into beard from roots to tips. Use daily for best results.

name: Professional Bleach Powder
summary: High-performance bleach powder for professional lightening services.
howToUse: Mix with developer at recommended ratio. Apply to dry hair. Process and rinse. For professional use only.

name: Oxidizing Developer 30 Vol

image.caption: Stable consistency for precise color mixing.

summary: Professional-grade hydrogen peroxide developer for color and lightening.
benefits: Compatible with all professional color lines
howToUse: Mix with color or bleach at recommended ratio. Apply immediately. For professional use only.
